name: Cooperative Escape Room VR Jan Jam 2022
name_original: Cooperative Escape Room VR Jan Jam 2022
description:
Work in progress submission for VR Jan Jam 2022. (Sorry you can't actually escape.)

A cooperative VR escape room experience!

  •  Write on the window to communicate.
  • Find puzzle items and share them through the airlock!
  • Work together to escape, or remain forever trapped!

Multiplayer Instructions

  • One player acts as the host, the other a client.
  • As the host start the game and click the host button on the display on the wall.
  • As the client enter the hosts IP into the address box and click "Join Server"
  • Multiplayer only tested on local network.

If you are just checking the game out single player hit the host button and walk into the teleporter.

Game Jam Team:

Alex Steffler, Stefan Lynka, Michelle Papadopoulos, Ivy Lee, Adam Kosh, Justin Stocks, Nick Wilson, Mark Bavis, and David Whittaker. Thanks everyone for participating!
